    • Uses of Server in Network.Commands

      Methods in Network.Commands with parameters of type Server 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Who.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      Execute a command which will alert the Client of all of the logged in Players.
      void Use.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm) 
      void Tell.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      The execute function will make sure that the Player who is receiving the message exists and that the arguments are properly there.
      void Take.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      The execute command will determine what action the Client is trying to do depending on their arguments.
      void SocialCommand.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      The execute command is executed whenever a SocialCommand should take place.
      void Score.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      The execute method will get the Client's Player and build a String that contains all of the Player's statistics.
      void Say.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      The execute method will make sure that the message is not empty or only containing whitespace.
      void Retreat.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      Attempt to retreat on the Character specified.
      void Quit.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm) 
      void Ooc.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      The execute command will search through all of the Players in the World.
      void Move.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      The execute command is executed when the Client wishes to move.
      void Look.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      If there are no arguments provided, return the room description and alert the other occupants of the same Area that the Player has looked around the room.
      void Inventory.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      Create a list of the equipped items and all other items and send the Client a Note containing all of the information.
      void Increase.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      Execute the Increase command.
      void Give.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      The player wishes to give one of their items to another player.
      void Equip.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      Attempt to (un)equip the Item, and send the response back to the Client.
      void Drop.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      Drop an Item into the Client's current Area.
      void Commands.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      Build a list of every command possible, with arguments, and send the Client a Note containing the list of commands.
      void Command.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      The execute method is the default method for all of the commands in the CommandList.
      void Attack.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      First, search if there is a Character in the Area that has the name that the Client wishes to attack.
      void Advance.execute(Server s, java.lang.String message, Server.ClientManager cm)
      Attempt to advance on the Character specified.
